title: Aadrika Contemporary Mangalsutra Bracelet
features: A delicate gold chain with small black onyx beads forming the base. A central CZ diamond encrusted pendant with a flower motif. Below the pendant are sleek gold tassels. Secured with an adjustable clasp for a comfortable fit.
description: This modern Mangalsutra bracelet is perfect for the contemporary woman who wants to celebrate her marriage in style. The combination of gold, black onyx beads, and sparkling CZ diamonds creates a unique and elegant look. Lightweight and comfortable for everyday wear.
